SUMMARY: NESTED | FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD DETAIL: FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD

com.MASTAdView
Interface MASTAdDelegate.AdActivityEventHandler

Enclosing class:
MASTAdDelegate
public static interface MASTAdDelegate.AdActivityEventHandler

Interface which supports custom callback to be invoked when ad view is attached to or detached from an activity (window), and when a banner ad view "expands" in any way (MRAID expand, resize, or interstitial display), and closes back again.

Method Summary
 void onAdAttachedToActivity(com.MASTAdView.core.AdViewContainer sender)
          This is called when the view is attached to a window.
 void onAdClosed(com.MASTAdView.core.AdViewContainer sender)
          This is called when an expanded view is closed, returning to banner state, or "gone" for interstitial ads.
 void onAdDetachedFromActivity(com.MASTAdView.core.AdViewContainer sender)
          This is called when the view is detached to a window.
 void onAdExpanded(com.MASTAdView.core.AdViewContainer sender, int height, int width)
          This is called when a banner ad "epxands" to larger size; the expand can be due to an MRAID expand or resize, or displaying an interstitial ad display.
 

Method Detail

onAdAttachedToActivity

void onAdAttachedToActivity(com.MASTAdView.core.AdViewContainer sender)
This is called when the view is attached to a window. See the underlying web view onAttachedToWindow documentation for more information.

Parameters:
sender - The ad view from which the event originated is passed as a parameter.

onAdDetachedFromActivity

void onAdDetachedFromActivity(com.MASTAdView.core.AdViewContainer sender)
This is called when the view is detached to a window. See the underlying web view onDetachedToWindow documentation for more information.

Parameters:
sender - The ad view from which the event originated is passed as a parameter.

onAdExpanded

void onAdExpanded(com.MASTAdView.core.AdViewContainer sender,
                  int height,
                  int width)
This is called when a banner ad "epxands" to larger size; the expand can be due to an MRAID expand or resize, or displaying an interstitial ad display.

Parameters:
sender - The ad view from which the event originated is passed as a parameter.
height - Height of "expanded" view.
width - Width of "expanded" view.

onAdClosed

void onAdClosed(com.MASTAdView.core.AdViewContainer sender)
This is called when an expanded view is closed, returning to banner state, or "gone" for interstitial ads.

Parameters:
sender - The ad view from which the event originated is passed as a parameter.
